overview: Alma Rodríguez is the first woman to graduate in saxophone in Mexico, surrounded by the mysticism that is placed on those who stand out in her midst, we will delve into this history that ranges from student strikes to problems faced by women in Mexico; we will lift the veil that covers Alma and we will discover who she is inside her. In these times of change, it is time to meet those who led the way.
title: Colibrí
